GDP is the main characteristic of the economic success of countries that measures its economic growth or recovery. GDP growth is an important indicator for the Canadian dollar.

The indicator measures the volume of sales of new cars. It is used for assessing the economic outlook: the higher the level of sales is, the stronger the domestic needs of the population are. It has little impact on the Canadian dollar.
